Hey

Just wanted to follow up on this in case the timing was off.

A few teams I’ve worked with saw solid shifts pretty quick. One added £1M to pipeline in 3 months. Another closed a £1.6M trade deal by adjusting how they handled buyers and calls.

Most of it comes from making sales more simple and direct. 

If is looking at growth this quarter, happy to show how we’d approach it.

Cheers
Bailey

[thomson@mycloserscode.site]> wrote:

> Cheers
